src.dynamic_system.discrete_events.models namespace¶

Submodules¶

src.dynamic_system.discrete_events.models.discrete_event_model module¶

class src.dynamic_system.discrete_events.models.discrete_event_model.DiscreteEventModel(dynamic_system: DiscreteEventDynamicSystem, name: str = None, state: ModelState = None)¶

Bases: dynamic_system.core.base_model.BaseModel

DiscreteEventModel with an state

add(**kwargs)¶
confluentStateTransitionFunction(state: ModelState, inputs: ModelInput) → ModelState¶

Implements the confluent state transition function delta. The confluent state transition executes an external transition function at the time of an autonomous event.

Parameters

  • state (ModelState) – Current state of the model.

  • inputs (ModelInput) – Input trajectory x.

abstract externalStateTransitionFunction(state: ModelState, inputs: ModelInput, event_time: float) → ModelState¶

Implements the external state transition function delta. The external state transition function computes the next state of the model from its current total state (s,e) Q at time of an input and the input itself.

Parameters

  • state (ModelState) – Current state of the model.

  • inputs (ModelInput) – Input trajectory x.

  • event_time (float) – Time of event e.

getDynamicSystem() → dynamic_system.discrete_events.dynamic_systems.discrete_event_dynamic_system.DiscreteEventDynamicSystem¶

Returns the dynamic system where the current model belongs with

getOutput() → Any¶

Gets the output of the model.

getOutputModels() → Set[src.dynamic_system.discrete_events.models.discrete_event_model.DiscreteEventModel]¶

Returns the output models of the current model

getTime() → float¶

Gets the time of the next autonomous event.

abstract internalStateTransitionFunction(state: ModelState) → ModelState¶

Implements the internal state transition function delta. The internal state transition function takes the system from its state at the time of the autonomous event to a subsequent state.

Parameters

state (ModelState) – Current state of the model.

abstract outputFunction(state: ModelState) → Any¶

Implements the output function lambda. The output function describes how the state of the system appears to an observer when e=ta(s).

Parameters

state (ModelState) – current state s of the model.

schedule(**kwargs)¶
setUpState(**kwargs)¶
stateTransition(**kwargs)¶
abstract timeAdvanceFunction(state: ModelState) → float¶

ta(s)

Implement the model’s time advance function ta. The time advance function schedules output from the model and autonomous changes in its state.

Parameters

state (ModelState) – Current state of the system.
